txt.en: A herd of oxen grazes upon the green hills of Pinnath Gelin.
'Many thanks, friend! Locrin was right to send you here to help! All of us here at Cornworth appreciate what you have done for us.'

'Many of our hands did not return from the war, and each of us still on the farm has to work twice as hard as before! We need some hearty meals to keep us going. A herd of oxen grazes on the hill of Glaerendalf to the west of here. Will you hunt some of the dun cows there for their meat? Do not try it with any of the bulls, for their meat is likely as tough as they are!\n\n'Once you have accomplished that, can you bring the meat to my brother Branach on our farm of Cornworth? The farm is to the south-west of here.'
Locrin's brother Branach will be pleased to receive the meat you collected. He waits for you at the farm of Cornworth.
You have been tasked to hunt dun cows for food.\n\nOxen can be found on a hill called Glaerendalf, to the west.
Bring the meat to Branach at the farm of Cornworth
